title: 97/306/EC: Commission Decision of 18 April 1997 adjusting the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in Spain within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 April 1997 adjusting the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in Spain within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Spanish text is authentic) (97/306/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in Spain in the Annex to Directive 86/466/EEC, as amended by the Annex to Decision 89/566/EEC and by Directive 91/465/EEC, is hereby supplemented by the list in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 273, 24. 9. 1986, p. 104.
(4) OJ No L 251, 7. 9. 1991, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 308, 25. 10. 1989, p. 23.
